newsitem.title: BELGIUM: BBL equity rises by nearly 1.8 bln Bfr.
newsitem.headline: BBL equity rises by nearly 1.8 bln Bfr.

text.p: Belgian Banque Bruxelles Lambert (BBL) said on Wednesday that equity rose by 1.78 billion francs following the exercising of its B warrants.

Until December 15 the warrant, which was created within the framework of the optional dividend of May 1993, offered holders the right to a VVPR (reduced tax) share at 3,485 francs. That compares with a price of 6,310 at the close on December 13.
The bank said it was pleased to see 99.41 percent of the warrants were exercised, which meant that 512,019 new shares were issued.
